about_the_game:
When the siren songs of open waters, glittering treasure, and fierce freedom call to you, let the Battlewake OST transport you into the heart of the pirate's life. Composed by Jeremy Nathan Tisser, the creative soundsmith behind Raw Data's heart-pounding soundtrack, Battlewake's lush, elemental soundscapes will plunge you into a nautical war for the ages against the backdrops of New Urth's fantastical jungles, swamps, tundra, and beyond.

Comes with WAV and MP3 320 kbps formats

TRACKLIST:

1 Battlewake: The Boatman's Call
2 The Ballad of Diego Teyana IV
3 Into the Maelstrom
4 Lullaby for the Relentless
5 Battle of the Frozen Bog (ft. Eru Matsumoto)
6 The Sinking of Lumot Glacier (ft. Eru Matsumoto)
7 Zhang the Immortal
8 Jade and Steel
9 Ashes of the Undying
10 Water Upon the Fire
11 The Fate of the Throne
12 The War at Urth's End
13 Red Skies at Dawn
14 The Golden Age of Pirates

name: Battlewake - OST

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Storage: 120 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 800 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
